sbp.client.handler module¶

The sbp.client.handler module contains classes related to SBP message handling.

class sbp.client.handler.Framer(read, write, verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Framer class frames bytes into SBP messages.

read : port
Stream of bytes to read from.
write : port
Stream of bytes to write to.
readall(size)[source]¶

Read until all bytes are collected.

size : int
Number of bytes to read.
receive()[source]¶

Read and build SBP message.

send(msg_type, data, sender)[source]¶

Build and write SBP message.

msg_type : int
SBP message type.
data : string
SBP message payload.
sender : int
SBP sender id.
class sbp.client.handler.Handler(read, write, verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Handler class provides an interface for connecting handlers to a driver providing SBP messages.

read : port
Stream of bytes to read from.
write : port
Stream of bytes to write to.
verbose : bool
Print out errors.
add_callback(callback, msg_type=None)[source]¶

Add per message type or global callback.

callback : fn
Callback function
msg_type : int
Message type to register callback against. Default None means global callback.
call(msg)[source]¶

Process message with all callbacks (global and per message type).

get_callbacks(msg_type)[source]¶

Return all callbacks (global and per message type) for a message type.

msg_type : int
Message type to return callbacks for.
remove_callback(callback, msg_type=None)[source]¶

Remove per message type of global callback.

callback : fn
Callback function
msg_type : int
Message type to remove callback from. Default None means global callback.
send(msg_type, data, sender=66)[source]¶

Build and write SBP message.

msg_type : int
SBP message type.
data : string
SBP message payload.
sender : int
SBP sender id.
start()[source]¶

Start processing SBP messages with handlers.

stop()[source]¶

Stop processing SBP messages.

wait(msg_type, timeout)[source]¶

Wait for a SBP message.

msg_type : int
SBP message type.
timeout : float
Waiting period
class sbp.client.handler.ReceiveThread(receive, call)[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

The ReceiveThread class provides a processing thread for framing and handling SBP messages.

receive : fn
Receiving function returns SBP messages.
call : fn
Callback functions.
run()[source]¶

Reading and handling loop.

stop()[source]¶

Stop the thread before the next message.
